item.title: Достопримечательности Местиа
item.description: Mestia, nestled in the heart of the Svaneti region, is a charming mountain town renowned for its stunning landscapes and rich cultural heritage. This picturesque town is dotted with ancient Svan towers, each standing as a testament to the enduring history and traditions of the Svan people. Mestia serves as a gateway to some of Georgia’s most breathtaking natural wonders, including the mesmerizing Koruldi Lakes and the awe-inspiring Chalaadi Glacier.
